name: Galileo Galilei
what_did:
Galileo used telescopes to study space and proved that the Earth goes around the Sun.
He discovered moons around Jupiter and saw craters on the Moon.
Many people didn’t believe him, and he got in trouble for his ideas.
why_matters:
Galileo helped start modern science.
He showed that we should look at the world carefully and test ideas.
He changed how people thought about the universe.

questions.q: What planet did Galileo see had moons?
What did Galileo believe about Earth?
options: It was the center of the universe

questions.q: Why did Galileo get in trouble?
options: He told people to go to space
His ideas disagreed with the church

fun_fact: Galileo made his own telescope and saw Saturn’s rings!
